name: Denta Comfort Toothbrushes
description: Denta Toothbrush has been further improved with a two component handle and curved neck for better grip and wider reach focusing on guaranteeing consumers high quality, good oral health. Denta ToothBrush complies with the standards and requirements stipulated by the Dental Association of Sri Lanka (SLDA) and the Sri Lankan Standards Institution (SLS). *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
